circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Marham at 0003LT on an operation to Kiel. While returning to base, it crashed just beyond the airfield while making a second attempt to land. The airplane was destroyed and all six crew members were uninjured. 
Crew:
Sgt E. J. Chidgey, 
Sgt H. G. Huckle, 
Sgt R. J. Alexander, 
Sgt T. A. E. Bridewell, 
Sgt Spilsbury,
Sgt E. S. Spong.
